summary:
Saa Bluu is ontstaan uit respect voor de oudere medemens. Het werd tijd voor een merk met prachtige textiele producten voor deze groep. Producten met een zorgelement en tevens een hedendaagse look en een positieve uitstraling. Het eerste product is een kledingbeschermer (slab voor volwassenen, schort, servet) die Saa Bluu verkoopt aan zowel zorgcentra als particulieren en mantelzorgers.
Ook door het inzetten van het geavanceerde gepatenteerde high performance materiaal toont Saa Bluu dat ze de gebruikers en hun verzorgers en mantelzorgers serieus neemt.

Saa Bluu was created out of respect for the elderly. It was time for a brand with beautiful textile products for this group. Products with a care element as well as a contemporary look and a positive appearance. The first product is a clothing protector (adult bib, apron, napkin) that Saa Bluu sells to care centers as well as private individuals and carers.
Also by using the advanced patented high performance material, Saa Bluu shows, it takes the users and their carers and informal carers seriously.

treasury_media.title: Saa Bluu kledingbeschermer Charlotte en Henry.jpg
treasury_media.description:
Een mooie,  waardige oplossing om uw kleding te beschermen tegen morsen tijdens het eten.
 Waterdicht, vuilwerend, afveegbaar, ultra licht textiel, vochtopnemend, soepel, duurzaam, met 30/40 graden wassen vlekvrij. 1 maat. Klittenbandsluiting achter.

treasury_media.title: Saa Bluu clothing protector Laura and David.jpg
treasury_media.description:
A beautiful, dignified solution to protect your clothes from spills while eating.
Waterproof, dirt-resistant, wipe-able, ultra-light textile, moisture-wicking, flexible, durable, with 30/40 degrees wash stain-free. 1 size. Velcro closure at the back.

treasury_media.title: Saa Bluu kledingbeschermer Marie en Victor.jpg
treasury_media.description:
Een mooie,  waardige oplossing om uw kleding te beschermen tegen morsen tijdens het eten.
 Waterdicht, vuilwerend, afveegbaar, ultra licht textiel, vochtopnemend, soepel, duurzaam, met 30/40 graden wassen vlekvrij. 1 maat. Klittenbandsluiting achter.

school.name: Hogeschool Kath. Leergangen (Now: Fontys, University of  Applied Sciences) Sittard.

education.field_of_study: Bachelor of Education in Primary Education

courses.name: Fashion studio / Easy map Pro Ned Graphics

profile_positions.description:
Saa Bluu is a startup brand with human worthy, high-performance, textile products for the
elderly.
A distinctive new brand with industrially, manufactured, textile productsfor seniors. We respect the elderly by designing more decent products and taking care of their special needs.
The products answer the need for high-performance by means of high-tech materials (out of the sport-industry) with a contemporary look.

Goods for the grey and glorious.
profile_positions.title: Owner/Director/Designer

profile_positions.description:
Flavoureyes was owned by Angelique Verstappen and myself. We are all-round textile product developers. Flavoureyes brought inspiration and we helped customers to correctly construct a textile product collection from concept, design, styling, development towards production and presentation. 

We loved to work with the teams of the customers because together we could make it happen.
We were very familiar in the field of textile design in combination with hardware.

Clients we worked for: Deltim (Poland), Inglesina (Italy), Hauck, iCoo (Germany), Snowbaby (China), Gubi 
(china),  TFK (Germany), etc.
profile_positions.title: owner, textile product developer, designer, stylist

company.name: id-2b (former All Our Kids Europe B.V.)

profile_positions.company: id-2b (former All Our Kids Europe B.V.)
profile_positions.description:
Id-2b was an international design company specialised in high-end nursery products such as strollers, buggies, furniture, and various textile accessories like diaper bags and foot muffs. The design, for the European and global brands, was done in Maastricht and the facilitation for production was done in China.

As manager design and styling I was responsible for the organisation, planning and quality delivered by the design and styling department. 
As creative manager I was responsible for quality and strategy of the creative departments within the organisation.

Clients I was co-operating with: Cybex (Germany), Inglesina (Italy), Silver Cross (UK), Casual Play (Spain), Hauck (Germany), ICOO (Germany), HTS (Norway), Mykko (Belgium) and more.
profile_positions.title: Manager Design and Styling / Creative Manager

company.name: All Our Kids Europe B.V. (evolved in id-2b)

profile_positions.company: All Our Kids Europe B.V. (evolved in id-2b)
profile_positions.description:
All our Kids Europe BV was an international design company specialized in high-end nursery products such as strollers, buggies, furniture, and various textile accessories like diaper bags and foot muffs. The design, for the European and global brands, was done in Maastricht. The association which A.O.K. belonged to, owned a production facility in China. In 2005 the company name changed into id-2b.

As a textile designer, I was responsible for the concepts, styling and designs of the textile parts of the projects involved.
As manager (starting from 2002), I was responsible for the organization, planning and quality delivered by the design and styling department.

Clients I was co-operating with: Maxi-Cosi (Netherlands), Mutsy (Netherlands), Nomad (Netherlands), Hauck (Germany), ICOO (Germany), Deltim (Poland), etc.
profile_positions.title: Textile designer / Manager Design and Styling

company.name: Lectra (acquired Computer Design Inc. /CDI Technologies Ltd.)

profile_positions.company: Lectra (acquired Computer Design Inc. /CDI Technologies Ltd.)
profile_positions.description:
Lectra is world leader in integrated technology solutions, CAD / CAM hardware and software, designed for industry and retailers that work with fashion, home-furnishing, automotive, aerospace, textiles, leather, industrial fabrics or composites.

During this period I was responsible for the design department of Lectra Benelux.

I demonstrated, supported users, provided training courses and workshops with Lectra design products.
Clients: Rucanor (Netherlands), Berghaus (Belgium), etc.
profile_positions.title: Application Specialist Textile Design

company.name: C.D.I. Technologies Ltd. Leamington Spa (UK) (bought by Lectra)

profile_positions.company: C.D.I. Technologies Ltd. Leamington Spa (UK) (bought by Lectra)
profile_positions.description:
CDI-Technologies Ltd. was a subsidiary of Computer Design Inc. which was based in Grand Rapids in America. The company developed high-end design software (2D and 3D) for the textile industry, fashion industry, retailers, automotive, aerospace and industrial and home furnishing industry.
Computer Design Inc. has been taken over by Lectra Systèmes in 1998. CDI-Technologies Ltd. was my customer before I became employed at CDI. In total I was connected with CDI for 9 years.

During this working period I was responsible for implementation of complete CDI configurations at major accounts in Europe Continent; I provided workshops, training courses, benchmarks, support, etc,

Clients I worked with: General Motors/Opel, Volkswagen, Mitsubishi, Hugo Boss, Esprit, Stork, KBC Manufaktur, etc.
profile_positions.title: Application Specialist Textile Design

profile_positions.description:
C.A.D. Camp Services was my own company, specialized in computer aided design services. I realised projects, gave lectures, workshops, benchmarks, etc.

Companies/organisations I worked for: C.D.I. Technologies ltd. Leamington Spa, Sociale dienst Maastricht, Bijenkorf, Rucanor, Academy of Fine Arts Arnhem, Academy of Fine Arts Maastricht, IBM, etc.
profile_positions.title: owner

profile_positions.description: Teacher textile design, textile knowledge, and fashion realisation. Key-member organisation of theater productions and integrative projects. Member national curriculum committee CAD-CAM Utrecht.
profile_positions.title: Teacher Apparel and Fabrics
